title: Results of Increasing Ocean Water Temperature

content.question: Which of the following changes are linked to an increase in ocean water temperature?

choices.label: An increase in metabolism in marine species and a decrease in dissolved oxygen in ocean water
A decrease in metabolism in marine species and a decrease in dissolved oxygen in ocean water
An increase in metabolism in marine species and an increase in dissolved oxygen in ocean water
A decrease in metabolism in marine species and an increase in dissolved oxygen in ocean water

content.answer: An increase in metabolism in marine species and a decrease in dissolved oxygen in ocean water
